column1: Well, if we draw stumps and don't go to them and somebody writes to the Chief Constable and says I 'm very disappointed that your force no longer is gone A L O's then I shall be very happy that that letters received by the Chief because we can say well we told you so.

column1: At half past six, the time for drawing stumps, the scores were tied, but S. M. J. Woods, the Gentlemen's ( and Somerset's ) captain, decided to have another shot.
